name: The Ferryman (bellatrion, silurius)
description:
Made by Silurius and Bellatrion for Mini Jam 102

In this game, play as a ferryman that must find and guide lost souls towards the other side.

To convince a soul to follow you, you will need to memorize the emotes it plays, and perform these emotes afterwards.

There are 6 souls to find in the level.

Once you have them all, reach the other side through the opened portal !

Font used:

Alpha Clouds by Chloe5972 (http://clofont.free.fr/)
